The Maid
tileImage gradient blue image Get Started THE MAID Image of a maid Back button to navigate previous activity Select your Language Please select Language of your choice Kannada Tamil Hindi English Marathi Bengali Gujarati Malayalam Telugu
Profile Process How would you like to setup your profile? Manual Automatic
Setup Profile Verify My Number Hire A Maid Mobile Number Full Name Upload Aadhar Card We will need your permission to access your photo library in order to let you pick your aadhar card Aadhar Card uploaded successfully Aadhar Card upload failed
Phone Verification Add Service Details We need to verify your account. Please enter the 6 digit verification code from text message. Verify OTP Resend OTP You have entered an incorrect OTP
Work Details Please enter the details of your work. We will verify these details before activating your profile. Resident Mobile Number Resident Full Name Resident Address Activate My Profile
Profile Created Great! Your profile has been created and will be activated shortly. Gallery Camera Cancel My Account
Please reach out to our back office team with following;
User Type Proceed as Customer Proceed as Maid 1. Original Aadhar Card. 2. Current Work Place details. 3. Mobile Phone for OTP verification.
Sign In
Bookings BOOKINGS EARNINGS Waiting for Customers A/C Summary Logout 0 Navigate My Rating
